original_solution_mapping.L1: Eunice can plant a total of 3 pots x 3 seeds = <<3*3=9>>9 seeds in three pots.
original_solution_mapping.L2: So, only 10 - 9 = <<10-9=1>>1 eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2298.
    Returns: the number of seeds planted in the fourth pot.
    """
    # L1
    num_pots_filled_initially = 3 # 3 pots
    seeds_per_pot = 3 # 3 seeds can be planted in 1 pot
    total_seeds_in_three_pots = num_pots_filled_initially * seeds_per_pot

    # L2
    total_seeds_eunice_has = 10 # 10 eggplant seeds
    remaining_seeds = total_seeds_eunice_has - total_seeds_in_three_pots

    # FA
    answer = remaining_seeds
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Eunice can plant a total of {num_pots_filled_initially} pots x {seeds_per_pot} seeds = <<{num_pots_filled_initially}*{seeds_per_pot}={total_seeds_in_three_pots}>>{total_seeds_in_three_pots} seeds in three pots.

So, only {total_seeds_eunice_has} - {total_seeds_in_three_pots} = <<{total_seeds_eunice_has}-{total_seeds_in_three_pots}={remaining_seeds}>>{remaining_seeds} eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Eunice can plant a total of 3 pots x 3 seeds = <<3*3=9>>9 seeds in three pots.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: So, only 10 - 3 = <<10-3=7>>7 eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'num_pots_filled_initially' (value: 3) was used instead of 'total_seeds_in_three_pots' (value: 9).
